title: Jira API Get Issue Operation Response Schema
description: Schema representing the output of the get issue operation in Jira API

expand.id: Expand options that include additional issue details in the response.

self.id: The URL of the issue details.

fields.id: The list of filed of the issue.

operations.id: The operations that can be performed on the issue.

linkGroups.id: The operations that can be performed on the issue.

Additional Properties.id: The operations that can be performed on the issue.

properties.id: Details of the issue properties identified in the request.

transitions.id: The transitions that can be performed on the issue.

versionedRepresentations.id: The versions of each field on the issue.

renderedFields.id: The rendered value of each field present on the issue.

statusCode.description: HTTP status code of the API response.

headers.description: HTTP headers of the API response.
